testcase.name: createuser

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"gender":"male","name":"Mackenzie Von","email":"fred.moore@hotmail.com","status":"active"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application.json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
